price: Ka ce: "Mummuna da mai kyau bã su daidaita, kuma kõ dã yawan mummuan yã bã ka sha'awa. Sabõda haka ku bi Allah da taƙawa, yã ma'abuta hankula ko la'alla zã ku ci nasara."
arabic: قُل لَّا يَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡخَبِيثُ وَٱلطَّيِّبُ وَلَوۡ أَعۡجَبَكَ كَثۡرَةُ ٱلۡخَبِيثِۚ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ يَٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul lā yastawī al-khabīthu wal-ṭayibu walaw aʿjabaka kathratu al-khabīthi fa-ittaqū al-laha yāulī al-albābi laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
